plot outline: Kalippu malayalam movie is a thriller film writen and directed by Jessen Joseph, Produced by Highmast Cinemas in association with Eshal Creations. The film subjects on five slum boys who struggles against problems or poor people of the village. It will be a family entertainer. Kalippu malayalam movie was the last movie of actor Kalashala Babu.
title: Kalippu
plot: The story of five youngsters hailing from a slum, who band together to tackle the problems by the villagers.

_Kalippu_ (qv) malayalam movie is a thriller film writen and directed by Jessen Joseph, Produced by Highmast Cinemas in association with Eshal Creations. The film subjects on five slum boys who struggles against problems or poor people of the village. It will be a family entertainer. _Kalippu_ (qv) malayalam movie was the last movie of actor Kalashala Babu.::Anaz Sainudeen
